text:
RIGHT NOW: 12 states are vaccinating all adults 16+. 
#Connecticut will be the 16th state in the nation that opens eligibility to all adults over age 16 on THURSDAY, April 1. 
How do you plan on scheduling a Covid-19 vaccine appointment? Tell us! ⬇️⬇️ @News12CT #COVID19 #vaccine https://t.co/g78rq4bENt
